name: Tainted Kingdom
description:
The Ivory King of Enavor's marriage to Lilith, the Queen of a neighboring realm, brings about the decay of the Enavor. Lilith and her compatriots, Gula and Avaric, plot to murder the King, and when he thwarts their plan, they call upon a demonic presence that corrupts them with pure sin and seals them away for eternity, but the seals begin to corrode, and the souls of the damned are waiting to return to the surface.

  • Movement: WASD
  • View: Drag mouse
  • Fire Revolver: Left Click
  • Switch Between Sword/Revolver: Right Click
  • Cycle Between Unlocked Ammo Types: Middle Mouse Wheel Spin
  • Reload: R
  • Jump: Space Bar
  • Double Jump: Double Tap space Bar
  • Sprint: Shift
  • Dodge: Double Tap Shift
  • Wall Run: Face towards wall while moving forward and press C
  • Slide: F
  • Cast Gauntlet Ability: E
  • Toggle Between Gauntlet Abilities: T
  • Cycle Between Gauntlet Loadouts: Tab

Combining Cores:

  • After defeating a boss you will be able to collect their core. This will be added to your inventory that you can access after each boss fight.
  • You can either socket the core into your gun for a special ammo shot or save them to combine them into different gauntlet abilities which can then be socketed into the 3 different loadouts

  • Engine: Unreal Engine 5
